     840                 :            :                  * @param endianness Endianness that will be used in the serialization of this value.
     841                 :            :                  * @return Reference to the eprosima::fastcdr::Cdr object.
     842                 :            :                  * @exception exception::NotEnoughMemoryException This exception is thrown when trying to serialize a position that exceeds the internal memory size.

     844                 :            :                 template<class _T>
     845                 :            :                     Cdr& serialize(const std::vector<_T> &vector_t, Endianness endianness)
     846                 :            :                     {
     847                 :            :                         bool auxSwap = m_swapBytes;
     848                 :            :                         m_swapBytes = (m_swapBytes && (m_endianness == endianness)) || (!m_swapBytes && (m_endianness != endianness));
     849                 :            : 
     850                 :            :                         try
     851                 :            :                         {
     852                 :            :                             serialize(vector_t);

     856                 :            :                         {
     857                 :            :                             m_swapBytes = auxSwap;

     859                 :            :                         }
     860                 :            :

    1632                 :            :                  * @param vector_t The variable that will store the sequence read from the buffer.
    1633                 :            :                  * @param endianness Endianness that will be used in the serialization of this value.
    1634                 :            :                  * @return Reference to the eprosima::fastcdr::Cdr object.
    1635                 :            :                  * @exception exception::NotEnoughMemoryException This exception is thrown when trying to deserialize a position that exceeds the internal memory size.
    1636                 :            :                  */
    1637                 :            :                 template<class _T>
    1638                 :            :                     Cdr& deserialize(std::vector<_T> &vector_t, Endianness endianness)
    1639                 :            :                     {
    1640                 :            :                         bool auxSwap = m_swapBytes;
    1641                 :            :                         m_swapBytes = (m_swapBytes && (m_endianness == endianness)) || (!m_swapBytes && (m_endianness != endianness));
    1642                 :            : 
    1643                 :            :                         try
    1644                 :            :                         {
    1645                 :            :                             deserialize(vector_t);
    1646                 :            :                             m_swapBytes = auxSwap;
    1647                 :            :                         }
    1648                 :            :                         catch(exception::Exception &ex)
    1649                 :            :                         {
    1650                 :            :                             m_swapBytes = auxSwap;
    1651                 :            :                             ex.raise();
    1652                 :            :                         }
    1653                 :            : 
    1654                 :            :                         return *this;
    1655                 :            :                     }

    1992                 :            : 
    1993                 :            :                 /*!
    1994                 :            :                  * @brief This function template deserializes a raw sequence.
    1995                 :            :                  * This function allocates memory to store the sequence. The user pointer will be set to point this allocated memory.
    1996                 :            :                  * The user will have to free this allocated memory using free() 
    1997                 :            :                  * @param sequence_t The pointer that will store the sequence read from the buffer.
    1998                 :            :                  * @param numElements This variable return the number of elements of the sequence.
    1999                 :            :                  * @return Reference to the eprosima::fastcdr::Cdr object.
    2000                 :            :                  * @exception exception::NotEnoughMemoryException This exception is thrown when trying to deserialize a position that exceeds the internal memory size.
    2001                 :            :                  */
    2002                 :            :                 template<class _T>
    2003                 :            :                     Cdr& deserializeSequence(_T *&sequence_t, size_t &numElements)
    2004                 :            :                     {
    2005                 :            :                         uint32_t seqLength = 0;
    2006                 :            :                         state state(*this);
    2007                 :            : 
    2008                 :            :                         deserialize(seqLength);
    2009                 :            : 
    2010                 :            :                         try
    2011                 :            :                         {
    2012                 :            :                             sequence_t = (_T*)calloc(seqLength, sizeof(_T));
    2013                 :            :                             deserializeArray(sequence_t, seqLength);
    2014                 :            :                         }
    2015                 :            :                         catch(eprosima::fastcdr::exception::Exception &ex)
    2016                 :            :                         {

    2035                 :            :                 /*!
    2036                 :            :                  * @brief This function template deserializes a raw sequence with a different endianness.
    2037                 :            :                  * This function allocates memory to store the sequence. The user pointer will be set to point this allocated memory.
    2038                 :            :                  * The user will have to free this allocated memory using free() 
    2039                 :            :                  * @param sequence_t The pointer that will store the sequence read from the buffer.
    2040                 :            :                  * @param numElements This variable return the number of elements of the sequence.
    2041                 :            :                  * @return Reference to the eprosima::fastcdr::Cdr object.
    2042                 :            :                  * @exception exception::NotEnoughMemoryException This exception is thrown when trying to deserialize a position that exceeds the internal memory size.
    2043                 :            :                  */
    2044                 :            :                 template<class _T>
    2045                 :            :                     Cdr& deserializeSequence(_T *&sequence_t, size_t &numElements, Endianness endianness)
    2046                 :            :                     {
    2047                 :            :                         bool auxSwap = m_swapBytes;
    2048                 :            :                         m_swapBytes = (m_swapBytes && (m_endianness == endianness)) || (!m_swapBytes && (m_endianness != endianness));
    2049                 :            : 
    2050                 :            :                         try
    2051                 :            :                         {
    2052                 :            :                             deserializeSequence(sequence_t, numElements);
    2053                 :            :                             m_swapBytes = auxSwap;
    2054                 :            :                         }
    2055                 :            :                         catch(eprosima::fastcdr::exception::Exception &ex)
    2056                 :            :                         {
    2057                 :            :                             m_swapBytes = auxSwap;
    2058                 :            :                             ex.raise();
    2059                 :            :                         }
    2060                 :            : 
    2061                 :            :                         return *this;
    2062                 :            :                     }
